text: Has anyone successfully used alpine.js from within a HubSpot module? Can't seem to get any code to run & wondering if the way HubSpot separates module code is preventing the inline-html nature of alpine

I havent personally tried alpine.js yet(definitely seemed interesting). Vue js and react can be used on HubSpot however, so I'm sure alpine can. It may be easier to require your alpine js instead of use the module.js file(especially if youre using a build step).
hello everyone, someone can tell me if i can run a VUE app in hubl ??
